comment.diff_hunk:
@@ -13,7 +13,11 @@ endif()
 if(OQS_USE_AES_OPENSSL)
     set(AES_IMPL aes/aes_ossl.c)
 else()
-    set(AES_IMPL aes/aes_c.c)
+   set(AES_IMPL aes/aes.c aes/aes_c.c)
+    if (OQS_USE_CPU_EXTENSIONS)
+      set(AES_IMPL ${AES_IMPL} aes/aes_ni.c)
+      add_compile_options(-maes)
comment.body: Can you change this to `set_source_files_properties(aes/aes_ni.c PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS -maes)`?

+// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT

comment.body: Thanks.  I've pushed two commits, one that directly applies the logic you gave above, and then one that puts it into a macro: since I know I'm going to need to use the same logic many times in that file, I thought a macro might be cleaner. Can you take a look and see if the macros matches the logic?
